original: Kugelberg, Hans Gustav Vilhelm, civiljägmästare, Norrikiöping, f. 21/9/11 i Ljusnarsberg, Örebro 1., av disp. Wilhelm K. o. Hann-Marie Berndes. G. 44 m. Margareta von Mühlenfels. Barn: Oliaes f. 45, Marianne 47. ■— Stiid;:ex. i Noirrköp. 31, utex. fr. stkoigs-höigsk. 35. Anst. v. Hoteens Brüks- & Fabriks A-B sed. 3i8, skogsförval t. där s’ed. 43.
translated: Kugelberg, Hans Gustav Vilhelm, forest officer, Norrköping, born on September 21, 1911 in Ljusnarsberg, Örebro County, son of Wilhelm K. and Hann-Marie Berndes. Married in 1944 to Margareta von Mühlenfels. Children: Oliaes born in 1945, Marianne born in 1947. ■— Completed high school in Norrköping in 1931, graduated from the Royal College of Forestry in 1935. Employed at Hoteens Brüks- & Fabriks A-B from 1938, forest management position since 1943.
